New Records: Ivory Coast scored two goals in the match, with O. Diakité contributing one goal and one assist.
Chad had one shot on target in the match, marking a new record for their performance in this context.
Key Match Events: J. Krasso scored the first goal for Chad in the 45th minute of play.
O. Diakité scored the second goal for Ivory Coast in the 55th minute of play.
Pre-Game Insights: The match was played at the Stade Omnisport Ahmadou Ahidjo, the home venue for both teams.
The match was part of the Africa Cup of Nations Qualification Group Stage, Group G.
Post-Match Reflections: The match ended with a scoreline of 0-2 in favor of Ivory Coast, marking a significant win for them in the qualification process.
Chad struggled to create chances, with Ivory Coast dominating possession and shots.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was broadcast live on BBC Sport.
Ivory Coast had 75.8% possession compared to Chad's 24.2%.
Others: The match was a crucial one for Ivory Coast in their quest to qualify for the Africa Cup of Nations.
